name: Regift (pad.3 / hypehog)
description:
A world where gift-giving is the primary (and only) form of communication.

Receive random (and occasionally odd) gifts from total strangers! Perhaps this means you are friends! Why don't you give them a gift back? It's the nice thing to do. Oh. You don't have any? Well that's alright! Just REGIFT something.

Earn points by taking and giving gifts. Earn enough to beat the level and you win the game! Easy!

Controls:

All mouse-based. Click people and objects in the scene, and the buttons on the control panel.

How To Play:

Click a character to see if they have a gift ready for you - then click the gift above their head to open it. Accept the gift with the "Accept Button". Select gifts for giving by clicking on them in the inventory (you can see a preview of which gift you have selected on the control panel), then give with the Give Gift button, or Wrap the gift (if you have collected some wrapping paper).

You can't give someone the same gift they gave you, and wrapped gifts rack up more points when you give them.

Created by Patrick Plunkett for the 8-Bits-to-Infinity Easy Jam.
